org.assimbly.connector

Interface Broker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActiveMQArtemis, ActiveMQClassic

    public interface Broker
     This interface is meant to configure and manage a broker.

 A broker is a message broker.
 A broker implements queueing and/or topics.

 For a valid configuration check the website for the used implementation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getBroker()
      Get the broker (can be used to access extended methods by the implementation (ActiveMQ classic, ActiveMQ artemis) Note: You need to cast the object based on the implementation you are calling.
      java.lang.String getFileConfiguration()
      Get the broker configuration as XML from the broker path.
      java.lang.String info()
      Info of the running broker.
      java.lang.String restart()
      Restarts the broker from a file configuration.
      java.lang.String restartEmbedded()
      Restarts the embedded broker
      void setBaseDirectory(java.lang.String baseDirectory)
      sets the connector base directory.
      java.lang.String setFileConfiguration(java.lang.String brokerConfiguration)
      Sets the broker configuration from a XML A default configuration is return when brokerConfiguration param is an empty string.
      java.lang.String start()
      Starts the broker from a file configuration.
      java.lang.String startEmbedded()
      Starts an embedded broker on a localhost (use this for testing).
      java.lang.String status()
      Status of the broker: "started" or "stopped"
      java.lang.String stop()
      Stops the broker.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileConfiguration

        java.lang.String getFileConfiguration()
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Get the broker configuration as XML from the broker path. A default configuration is return when no configuration is found.
        Returns:
        broker configuration as XML
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if configuration can't be retrieved
        java.io.IOException

      • setFileConfiguration

        Parameters:
        brokerConfiguration - (XML)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if configuration can't be set
        java.io.IOException

      • setBaseDirectory

        void setBaseDirectory(java.lang.String baseDirectory)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        sets the connector base directory. In this directory everything is stored (alert, events)
        Parameters:
        baseDirectory - (path)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if base directory can't be set is not available

        status of broker
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if broker can't be started

      • getBroker

        java.lang.Object getBroker()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the broker (can be used to access extended methods by the implementation (ActiveMQ classic, ActiveMQ artemis) Note: You need to cast the object based on the implementation you are calling. And...calling this you're on your own :)
        Returns:
        returns broker as object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if broker can't be found
